content.detailedDescription: Please note this sighting happened in the state of indiana not michigan. white orb lights, firey red/orange bell shaped orbs, boomerang objects.
content.summary: Should be indiana not michigan for below report.

content.detailedDescription: I was a passenger driving in a typical family van with the big slider door window next to me heading east bound on the indiana 80/90tollway from illinois tristate 294 to a small town in michigan not far from the indiana border. at first i noticed a small white light the size of a beach ball off in the distance low near a water tower. i kept watching it and thought it may be a helicopter or some sort of pole light. i kept wathcing it and it was moving slowly very low. i saw no sudden movements, faa lights, markings, windows, structure. as we got closer to the light i saw it was even with us in the vehicle and i saw the light just slowly move in front of this water tower not far from the tollbooths. as i watched it slowly just disappeared. i did not think more of it. then as we drove and a few several minutes passed i saw a white light low to the ground in the field next to me. i then saw this light move to the tree. again, this object was so low to the ground i could not be an aircraft. again there was no faa lights, markings, structure, noise. i watched and the light just disappeared again. then we were driving through alot of trees as we got out of the heavy trees i saw the full moon with a white light right in front of it on an angle very close to the ground. this light almost looked like it was suntanning itself in front of the moon. both were the same bright white color. please note there also was a planet(venus?) to the right of the moon throughout this whole drive and was basically the same color. but it never moved because it was a planet. this light was a pure pearl white and it was not an advertising light. this time i took pictures with my digital camera of what i could in this moving van. then several minutes later i saw what i can only describe as a bright almost firey orange/red orb that kind of looked bell shaped moving slowly out of nowhere over on the side of the road. i watched and waited for flashing faa lights, noise, structure, sudden movements. again nothing happened except that this light just slowly hovered and went down into the side of the road tree lines. again, i took a picture with my digital camera. then we we somewhere near south bend or mishwaka, mile marker 77 or so. whatever this area it is very residential and commerical. when i looked over the rooftops of the houses from the road i saw what i can only saw what looked like a huge boomerang or triangle type craft hovering right over the rooftops. it seemed to have some sort of tubular metallic structure with several lights of red, green, blue, yellow, orange. this craft was not whole like a commercial airplane, it seemed to be in parts almost like a kids jungle gym. when i saw this i freaked out because it was so low and our car was almost above it on the tollway. it was also so close to us that it thought this cant be unless this plane was crashing. in my mind i think this and then there is another smaller craft next to it about half the size. again, this was too close for another plane to be probably 500 feet and low over the rooftops.It had a similar structure with lights as well. no noise, no flashers, blinkers, windows, markings.I dont remember if i got pictures of this because it happened so suddenly. then as we drove again i saw a firey orange/red bell shaped orb start out of nowhere over from the other side of the road from the traffic on the other side. this orb slowly made its way to my side of the road and then slowly continued to move towards us. then it slowly started to discend into the trees at about mile marker 85. please note pictures were taken by me. the family is used to me taking picture anywhere and anytime so not alot of fuss was made about it. also because we had a handicapped child with us on this trip and could not bring the real attention to the matter except to one other family member who confided in me seeing something as well.
content.summary: White orb lights, red/orange fiery bell orbs, boomerang low flying craft off the i 80/90 tollway

content.detailedDescription:
I was in a back room of my house at dusk when i went to the window to draw the curtains, looked up and saw an object hovering, (approximately 40-50 metres) above and behind the house.
there were children playing outside in the lane and i heard their voices but they were called inside.
 immediately i could see this was no normal earthly type of aircraft and that it was an unidentifiable aerial object. it was stationery and silent. it was orange with fire, but it was not on fire as the fire was within it.  the shape was asymmetrical appearing roughly like the side of a van with its side open. i could see movement, possibly figures of about human height, behind the flames. towards the 'back', low down there was a row of deep red lights which moved forward and back repetitively.
i was very excited. i considered going outside but decided not to.

after some minutes the object began to move forward (south) for a very short distance then did a right turn, (west). when it turned i was looking at the back and could no longer see the flames. there were coloured lights on the back and i watched it travel slowly across the undulating country. 
as it travelled i rang my brother, still watching it, to advise him that it was going towards the town where he lived,  25kms distant.

a wide band of dense cloud had come up from the western horizon and the object went behind this cloud disappearing from view.  

i made diagrams and a painting of the object. cannot yet discuss the other possible witnesses who were children.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Close encounter with unidentifiable flying phenomenon.

content.detailedDescription: I was at home and asleep in my room on  my couch. i noticed the alien comning out of my closet and i dont remember what caused me to notice it. when i first noticed it i thought it was my sister playing or i was dreaming because i was awake and there was like a mist or smoke around it. it looked like a man or woman in a full body infectious diseases suit with a mask over the face with a long tube like a vaccum hose where the nose would be. it had a small light somewhere on it but i dont recall where. it was doing something to my right knee and then i triued to scream for my mom and i couldn't move or scream. i was so scared!! i just laid there and when it fionally stopped and it was gone and i dont know when or how it was gone -i think it just went back into the closet.Once it was gone i got up and ran into my moms room and woke her up and i cried and begged her to let me sleep with her and she asked whjy so i told her. we called a friend of hers who has been abducted before and she said that i was abducted. this was the first time i was abducted there have been more and i get bits and peices of them as i go as far as memory. i have never heard of you guys before and so i have never put anything on here before now. my mom said if i did that you could interveiw me and help me remember and help me with the emotional stress this has caused me. please let me know what to do. i am sorry if this is the wrong place for this but i didnt know where else to put it. thank you for you help. annonymous
content.summary: Was abducted by an alien and no i am not crazy!

content.detailedDescription: While driving as a passenger north on m66 just north of featherstone road i was taken back by what i can only describe as what i saw. i saw to the east of me an extremley large group of three inverted y's or wishbone shaped objects. these objects were flying in a line formation. the two outter objects were all white in color and the center object of this formation was blinking red. estimated size of this object from my perspective was as big as a football field. it seemed to hover without moving and was relativly low for an aircraft in this area. this object suddely disappeared.
content.summary: A triple wishbone shaped object east of m66

content.detailedDescription: I had met a friend who knew of my interest in ufos -- she was an old neighbor of mine who had also witnessed a craft i had seen 3 years earlier. she had since moved with her family into a new house on the other side of the small town we lived in. she told me about a strange event that was happening every evening at her house and asked if i would be interested in coming over to see for myself. a few days later, i arrived at her home just before dusk as she had told me this event usually occured as it was beginning to get dark. the house had a large yard which was surrounded by woods -- there were no neighbors for quite some distance -- typical in those days for rural ohio. we went outside as it started to get dark -- watching the woods to the right of the house. it was not quite dark (you could still see the outlines of the trees against the sky) when through the woods came a procession of white cigar shaped craft. there were 3 of them -- one behind the other. each was 50-70 feet long and had red, white and blue lights. they were completely silent and had no wings or fins. the angle at which they emerged would suggest that they were coming from a position on or underground. we watched as they slowly flew over the field across from her house and disappeared into the distance.
content.summary: Group of cigar shaped craft emerging from woods

content.detailedDescription:
Diferent ufos i took pictures of during a lightning storm on augest 16 2008 in kirkland washington

 i live in ******* washington and on sunday august 16th we had a lightning storm and i decided to go out and try to catch a picture of it ,,it was strange out because we normally don't get a lightning storm and there was no wind ,no rain and no sound,,just lightning my girl friend suggested we go out and try to take some pictures ,,and so i started to try to get some pictures of the lightning flashes i was to slow so i decided to do a little movie on my camera and i saw a white light flying around in the cameras view screen then i thought to take some more pictures facing the lightning and this is what i got ,,now i did some cut and paste to get a lot of the different shapes colors and sizes on one picture and the only other thing i did was to lighten the pictures and enhance the color that was already there ,,i have all the original pictures and these are all on one and enhanced for easer viewing,,i am long winded ,,sorry anyway i would love to know what you think these might be ,,i have seen the ghost busting shows and there 'orbs' are always white and small these are pretty big and i have never seen an orb other than white .Could these be ufos ,,if so i got a real show for my money i have always wanted to see something but never expected it to be in my back yard anyway  i would really appreciate your initial thoughts on this collogue,,thanks so much 
 
pjd
content.summary: During a lightning storm we went outside to take a picture of the lightning and got these insted

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i went to my mothers house for dinner. after dinner and visiting a while is was dark outside. my mother and her husband walked us out to the car and helped us get our kids in the car seats. we continued to talk in there driveway. my mother and my wife were facing north talking about what ever they were talking about and my mothers husband and i were talking about whatever and him and i were facing south. there is a road that runs east to west right next to thier house. next to that road is a small cornfield. up that road looking west there is a tree line with some woods that runs into the cornfield. i and my mothers husband see a large round bright light slowly hovering west to east over the tree line, over the corn field and stops about 2 stories high right in front of us over the cornfeild. it sat there for at least 45 seconds, made no noise, no sound and all i could see was a round ball of light. it then traveled over the tree line of the corn feild towards town heading south at about 45 miles per hour. this object made no sound. in our town, you do not see planes unless they are real high in the sky. this object ball of light was right in frony of us 20 feet away about 2 stories high.

i did not see metal, just a bright light. i and 3 other witnesses seen this object, however my wife does not believe in ufo's, however she can not explain what she saw. this area where my mother lives is like the sticks, there is not alot of houses and it was getting late. i never did ask around. i had no idea there was a place to report ufo's or i would have done it 3 years ago right after it happened.

i felt excited and a little scared, mostly excited. this bright light did not rotate as far as i could see, it reminded me of the size of the sun, but right in front of you. if i was to guess the size of the object if there was an object under that bright light, the light size would be like 3 times smaller than the big ball at epcot, walt disney world.

i hope this helps. dubuque iowa is not a milatary town, i think we have a reserve national guardd center and you never see helicopters or planes.

this was the weirdest thing i ever saw and hope i see it again and hope to take photos next time now that i have at least a cell phone now with a camera.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Round big light, 2 stories high right in front of us over a small corn field

content.detailedDescription: On the road going to omena lake you are on a hill looking down. from this area i saw what looked liked a tubular red, green object shaped like a boomerang and it was huge!!! it was hovering very low over the lake. then as we went down the road a light was coming from the field and it came over the tree line literally right over our car on the road on my side of the car.  it was some sort of structure not solid, but silver tubed that had two green lights on each side of it and a bright white light in the middle. the lights were very pure and bright as it came over the car i looked to my left, in front and in back of me. nothing could be seen of anything except what looked almost like a purlpe light that lit up the area around us for a second and it was gone. there was no noise at all. on another lake as we got settled i saw small green orbs almost star like come what seemed like out of nowhere from the south and traveled west slowly behind the trees on the other side of the lake.
content.summary: Triangular lights low over lake, lights over tree line and orbs going down behind tree line

content.detailedDescription: I was driving on my way to work down county road ww coming from kellner.It was around 9pm.I was talking on the phone and i looked up and saw a huge object hovering about tree level down the road.It had bright orangish yellow lights.As i got closer i could make out a saucer shape in the dark.I told the person i was talking to about this as i was driving toward it.I just couldnt believe what i was seeing.I was shocked.There was one van coming the other way other than that i saw nobody out that way.I wanted to get the vans attention and see if they could see it too.This object was hovering about tree level over a corn field at the intersection of county road ww and ff.I could make out perfect shapes of the lights.As i started to get even closer the lights kind of blurred and it took off.I could see the lights getting smaller until it was gone.I called and told my dad what i saw.He turned on his 2 police scanners to see if someone called it in.He called me back and said that they would scan and stop and all he would get is static.The funny thing is a few weeks back i looked at the same intersection on my way to work and saw those same lights in a distance.I didnt have any idea what it was.I looked again and it was gone so i just kind of wrote that one off.Last night though it was too big and too close to have any doubt.Drove by there on my way home in the morning and saw nothing  but corn and irrigation sprinkler.Wierd.
content.summary: Lights over corn field.

content.detailedDescription: Watching a fast moving star at high altitude from n.West going s.East when a light flashed south of the fast movin star 3 times at an interval of 2 sec. apart watched for another 5 min. saw a couple of shooting stars and then it got cloudy out.
content.summary: Tracking fast movin star ,then a seperate object blinked 3 times

content.detailedDescription: Going to bed. went to shut west bedroom window. in flies a plane stood and watched it move from north. then it stopped. the neighbors have two large trees in the west part of there yard but a large gap between them. it started to go from one tree to the other. then it would stop in the middle and just strobe. went and got my binoculars. large white light with strobing blue and green lights. i saw this thing a few nights ago and reported it. had been out in the yard earlier checking the skies and saw nothing. watched it's little dance in the sky for about 15 minutes when i was so tired i had to go to bed. i put the binoculars on the chair so i would know it was not a dream. they were there in the morning. this thing the other night when i reported it. went from around the mackinaw river to the fields behind my house. (which for some reason have been quite active this year.) in a blink of an eye.Seven or so miles.  very impressive!. why me i wonder. and by it's activities lately is it trying to signal me. something to ponder on. i'll look again tonight but days go by and it will take a break and then here we go again. thanks for having somewhere to go with this. marcia dover
content.summary: Recurring white light with flashing blue and green lights making different manuvers in the west sky

content.detailedDescription: This event made me a believer in this phenomenon called ufo's. i am a military brat. back in 1991 my family and i were staying in the temporary living quarters while we found a house at wright patterson air force base. one particular night my father and i wanted to go outside and look for meteors, a known meteor storm was going to be visible for our area, so we decided ot go outside. it was about 10 p.M. at night. my mother threw her back out so she stayed inside. we went outside and next to the recreation building right next to a tree. there was a disc shaped object hovering right about the big oak tree. the briallance of colors and changing of colors was amazing, i couldn't believe my eyes. my father who is a high ranking officer stood their with me. i was like dad, dad lets go inside and tell mom. the whole time i couldn't keep my eyes off of it. in my opinion i really feel the lights were trying to communicate with me, or that is how it seems. and then to this day, would make me believe i witnessed a stationary object acelerate from 0 to it looked like a blur in an arc motion to space. this was amazing. as a 10 year old air force brat, i have scene many aircraft that was classified at the time, for instance stationed in california we saw sr-71's all the time. many times i did see different aircraft. this technology is nothing close to anything i have scene since. my mother remembers me running inside and telling her all about it. my father still works for black project programs, so i brought it up to him again with my wife. my wife is sick of hearing the story, so i am like lets ask my father about what i saw again. i asked him again, and he said, not kidding," what we saw was a blimp", impossible. it makes me upset that my father can say that, knowning we saw a disc object, silent and take off over mach +.... a blimp. i am a believer, i really do not care if anyone else believes me. i know the truth, and since have read and looked at everything with a different eye.
content.summary: A brilliant disc, with red, blue, green yellow lights rotating and changing colors siting about 50 yards away at a heights about 100 feet..

content.detailedDescription:
The date and time of this incident is approximate, the event did occur around 9:30 pm and it also occurred in the first days of jan.  i���m recalling this narrative from the memories i have of the event as it occurred 34 years ago when i was 7 years old.  my sister who is 4 years older than me witnessed the same event, however, to this day we have never mentioned it in conversation with each other and didn���t really discuss it much after the day it happened.

we had both bundled into our coats to take our collie puppy out for the last time that evening.  we went out the backdoor of the home, but the puppy stayed at our feet rather than run out into the yard.  my older sister noticed the craft first, and told me to look.  we watched the craft hover motionless above a home about 100 yds behind our house.  the craft was approximately 50 to 60 feet above the house.  the craft was disk shaped with a very obvious dome on the top.  prior to gradually accelerating away the craft emitted a beam of light that lit a large area around the house it was above.  the craft then smoothly accelerated out of sight to the west.  my older sister looked at me and said, ���that must have been santa claus.���  

our dad was working in omaha at the time and came home about fifteen minutes after we came inside.  we were telling our mom about what we���d seen, my older sister kept saying it was santa.  both parents could probably see we were visibly shaken by the event.  my father spoke to me later about what i���d seen, i told him that it wasn���t santa.  he asked me to draw a picture of what i���d seen and i did and gave it to him.  i don���t know if he still has it or not.  my father told me that he had also seen lights in the sky that night as he was driving home.  the lights were all at a distance from him.  the next day i went to the house that the craft hovered above, i don���t exactly know what i expected to see but i remember that there wasn���t anything particularly out of the ordinary.

we moved from the area about two years later and we have only gone back to blair a few times.  the last time i went back was about 5 years ago, i took my wife and kids to see where i���d grown up.  our old house was still there as was the house the craft hovered over, not much had changed, but that event was the first thing i thought of when i saw the old house.

a little about the area around blair, ne:  (1.)  omaha is about 30 miles away and during the 70���s there was a large air force presence there.  (2.)  there was/is a nuclear power plant in fort calhoun, ne about 10 miles away.  my father had witnessed lights over the nuclear power plant several times.
content.summary: Witnessed a disc with a dome on top hovering above a house behind ours.

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside taking pictures of the skies, there was a storm coming,i wanted to take pictures of the awesome cloud formations and the lightening off in the distance. then i saw something in the sky..It was shiny but dark in color and it seemed to be just hovering there in the sky, not moving. it was there and then gone in a blink of my eye. it was like it was there and then became invisable or shot off so fast the normal eye could not judge it. it was about a 1 min and half at the most. then like it was never there it was gone. i didn't think much of it at first. then when i downloaded the pictures, i found one picture with what looks like a scoutship or lightship in the photo.

i am including the original photo and then two enlarged photos..1 at 400% and 1 at 200%. this is all they are enlarged!

none are touched up in anyway. i do not know how to touch up even if i wanted to.

i have researched ufos alot and i do feel in my heart that this is a picture of a lightship/scoutship.

make your own judgement,but make sure you go with what you feel and know in your heart!

october 14,2008 there will be a very large ship in the southern hempisphere. so be sure to look up in the skies!
content.summary: Dark bellshaped object- scoutship

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in the backyard just looking up at the stars.  we don't see very many in orange county.  then i noticed a small circle of light traveling across the night sky.  i knew it wasn't a plane because it had no other lights on it but also it was higher than any plane i've have ever seen.  it was very high up in the sky but i could see it was traveling at a very high rate of speed as i saw it cover a long distance in a short amount of time.  i don't believe it was a comet as i did not see any type of trail coming off it.  whatever it was it caught my attention.
content.summary: Saw a star-like object travel across the sky at a high rate of speed

content.detailedDescription:
Note: this is a revised, more detailed version of a sighting i submitted some time ago.

i once wrote about wanting to see a ufo ���if only to know they existed.��� after what happened some time later, i���ve been wondering if ���they��� heard me.

i remember that day clearly. it was on july 23, 2008 ��� a beautiful day with a clear blue sky. it was late afternoon and still light outside. i was in the kitchen making dinner and standing over the stove next to the large kitchen window. my husband was in the living room sitting at his computer.

i glanced out the window and saw a round disk flying slowly over the rooftops of the other apartment buildings. it moved very smoothly and was completely silent -- no engine noise -- nothing. it was made of some kind of white metallic substance that glistened like ice. i���ve never seen that type of metal before. i couldn���t see any windows or who was piloting it. i was surprised but not really afraid. i don���t know why. i just stared at it. there was a soft blue light underneath it that glowed. the blue light shimmered and seemed stronger toward the front of the craft. it passed right above my kitchen window heading in a southern direction. as it passed i saw it join another craft exactly like it. the second one was some distance away at a higher altitude. the first craft joined it and they silently flew side by side in a perfect formation. i watched them until they were far away and disappeared into the horizon. 

i stood in the kitchen for a long time after that. i���m not sure how long. i think i was still in shock. but i wasn't afraid. i don���t know why. after some time (not sure how long) i went into the dining room. i didn���t know how to tell my husband about what i���d just seen. i thought he wouldn���t believe me. i finally did tell him about it. i think he wanted to believe me, but he���s not quite sure what to think. i don���t blame him. i also couldn���t believe it happened.

i feel i���ve changed since then. i never thought much about life beyond my daily experience, especially not anything about space or ets. that was the stuff of movies. i started reading a lot about other people���s experiences with ufos and about other sightings in different places around the world. i needed information, and some answers. i read that other people have also had similar experiences, and that many of them are also trying to come to terms with it. sometimes when i think back to that day, i can���t believe it. but it was real ��� not a movie. 

i feel more people will begin to see and report ufo sightings. they will continue to increase. it���s as if a global shift is happening. maybe i���m imagining it, but some days i can sense them in my thoughts. i sometimes see fleeting images of them in my head. it���s not a negative feeling. it���s more like thinking about someone you vaguely know. i tend to look up at the sky more often like i���m waiting for something to happen, but i don���t know what. 

i���ve read about people who���ve had experiences similar to mine. they���ve also seen ets but are reluctant to report it or talk about it. i feel their contact with our planet will continue to increase. there���s more discussion about ets now than ever before. it���s as if we���re gradually being prepared to make a quantum leap in our perception of the universe.
content.summary: 2 ufos flew over apt. building - 9th district, paris france

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were sitting on our backporch before dinner.  the sun was beginning to set to the west when i noticed a star-like object in the sky to the west. my first thought was that it might be venus.  my husband thought that it was strange to see a star in the direction of the setting sun, we normally see the first stars of the evening in the eastern sky.  i looked at it through a pair of binoculars and noticed red and white lights that seemed to be flashing (rotating?).  the object moved toward the east and that's when i realized it could not be venus.  we watched the object for approximately 20-30 minutes until it seemed to change direction and move away from us (north).  we debated about what type of object it could have been. satellites do not change direction, planets and stars do not move that fast.  it was too high to be a plane.  we are at a loss to explain this sighting.
content.summary: Star-like object in daytime sky

content.detailedDescription:
on sunday evening 8/17/08 at about 7:00 pm i was fishing off the public pier at bangs lake with my 14 year old son and two other fishermen. the sky was bright and clear with only a few light clouds overhead. 
we were facing south when i told my son to look at the large jet (its color scheme was gray with 4 red engines and red tail) that probably 
took-off from o���hare airport and was just passing over us.
  that is when i saw much higher up more to the left a bright silver cigar shape traveling from s.West to n.East just below the clouds. 
i said 'look at it, it has no wings!'  
so i grabbed my binoculars (7x) from my fishing bucket/chair and stared at it almost straight overhead.
  it was a silver cigar without wings and was traveling as fast as or faster than a military jet but the next thing that struck me weird is this thing did not produce any vapor trail at all. none.
   it sped through 2 of the clouds before it was gone from sight in the n.East and it stayed very bright silver until out of my sight. 
it was hard to believe what i saw but it definitely was not a jet.
content.summary: Bright silver cigar-shape (no visible wings ) moving towards n.East over bangs lake

content.detailedDescription: I have noticed these lights in the sky for the past few hours. there appears to be at least four of them going in a cross shape. the go back so far, circle and meet in the middle. i tried taking a video to figure out what it is but its hard to see in the dark and with the clouds and my battery died so i got under a min. they are still there and i am almost certain it is not a plane because a plane would not go in several directions like that; especially so late at night and with the weather we had today. (was raining, lost power, thunder and lightning). i did not lose sight of it, it is still there.
content.summary: Strange ligts in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was working the early shift at tim horton's.  so i left the house about 5:30am.  i was riding my bike.  as i was turning onto a major street, i stopped dead in my tracks.  i had to look upwards.  it was over the lake.(nippissing)  i rubbed my eyes a few times thinking it was a trick.  i saw a few cars go by and slow down at this time.  i got off my bike and stared.  it hovered.  it looked like a balloon filled with the same stuff they use in street lights.  it kept me staring for about 10 minutes.  then it was gone.  no sound.  no bright flash.  i was left there stunned.  i couldn't remember where i was going or what i was suppose to be doing.  i finally got my stuff together, and got on my bike and rode to work.  i didn't notice i was shaking, until a co-worker mentioned it.  i told her what i had seen.  she said it was probably a weather balloon.  i called the next day and found out that the weather balloons are let go in sudbury.  not north bay.  any info would be greatly appreciated.  i also have more.....
content.summary: It looked like a glowing white baloon in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was standing outside talking to some family members and i looked up and saw a distant silver glint in the south-western sky. at first i thought it was a plane at first but then i noticed that it was round shaped. i looked at it for about 30 seconds and turned back around so i could point out the object. when i looked back up, it was completely gone. there was no way an aircraft could travel that fast because i had a very wide range of view and was only turned away for a few seconds.
content.summary: Distant silver glint for a few seconds and then gone.

content.detailedDescription:
On 8/08/08 i took a picture of a black triangular ufo (picture and report previously submitted). since then, i have taken more pictures trying to get another shot of the triangular object if it reappeared. today (8/18/08) at 4:28 pm, i got a picture of a different ufo in the same general area of the sky (ne approx 60 degrees elevation). i did not see or hear the object ..... only a photo.
       sky conditions were excellent (clear blue sky). at the top center of the photo is a white object. on zoom inspection, there appears to be a disc like recessed surface with a rim. you can see the shadow and sunlit area typical of a rim feature. next to the disc are white unknowns. 
      there may be a logical prosaic explanation for the object. i could not identify it, so it's a ufo to me.
content.summary: Photo of a disc like object with other unknowns

content.detailedDescription: Subject was about ten years old at the time.  he was standing in the back yard playing with his dog.  he noticed something moving out of the corner of his eye.  he had no idea of what it was.  it moved very slowly.  he watched it for a while, then looked down at his dog, looked back up and the object had disappeared.  object was stayed the entire time in the northeast direction.
content.summary: It was about as big as a house, triangle shaped with three briliant lights at each point.

content.detailedDescription:
I just remember seeing it in the sky it was quiet and still ,it had 
squarelike panels changing colors rapidly,red,yellow,blue?
it was around my birthday,me and some freinds were camping in my backyard.
i just remember looking at itfor maybe 10-15 min.I do not recall it leaving. even being 12 yrs. old i almost new it was something abnormal.I dont remember much more at this time.
content.summary: Kind of round      flashing   changing  colored lights

content.detailedDescription: didn't realize what was there until they were downloaded.
content.summary: Spherical and the other boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
I had just came from seeing my fiance's at super break (between 8pm-9pm on friday 15th of august 2008)  on the bypass 220 coming from state college, pa to bellefonte.  going on 220 is where i saw it.  well the sky was clear and it  was starting to get dark but you could still see all of the sky.  there was two clouds where one was bigger than the other on top of this lime plant close to pleasant gap.  i really did not think nothing about it.  i thought maybe it was lightening but i noticed it did not move.  on top of it not moving, it also started to shoot colorful lights from it like a boomerang shape.  so i do not know the shape of it because it was hiding behind the 2 clouds but it went back and forth from the shaping of the lights coming out of the clouds.  i did not know what happened to the lights because i was traveling in a main highway.  i was at least on the highway for at least 5 minutes.  these light in the clouds would show for 20 seconds and then vanish then reapear a minute later.  i lost sight of it when i got off the bellefonte 2nd exit. 
i thought it was crazy because it was right in clear view of the highway and i could not be the only one seeing this.
content.summary: Two big clouds, one smaller than other.The lights some times came out bommerang colors and just shot out

content.detailedDescription: I was on the computer and had a feeling to go outside,which i look for things every night i asked my husband to come ouy with me which he does but this time i told him he didn't have to but like a good husband he came out.We went out to the back yard i looked up didn't see anything so i went out further and then a plane went by and we heard that, then this bright light the size of a plane but no wings went over closer than the plane no noise then as we were looking it just got so bright like when a star shines it just went bigger with the bright light and was so bright then it went back to just a bright light no extra colors was long it headed north and then it disapeared as it went north.It was faster than a plane not like a jet nor a helicopter cause we see these all the time cause we live close to the airport.I thought at first it was a plane but no colored lights my husband told me that all this time he thought i was crazy going out to look up but now he believes we saw a ufo. we have seen the spacestation, this was closer much closer. what made us think it was a ufo was because when it went brighter it stopped and just stayed there for a few seconds maybe a minute.We are just so shocked and thrilled at the same time.I was hoping that it would come back so stayed outside for awhile then went in and went to bed.I hope other people saw it. it was strange it happened at 9:45pm august 18 2008.Please check this out as my husband said i should report it to the police but i was kinda stupid saying i would wait for someone else to report it first.
content.summary: Shape of a plane but no wings just a bright light that went brighter for two min then went back to reg light.Headed north no noise. big no extra lights.When it got brighter it went star like

content.detailedDescription:
For the record, i wasn't even "ufo hunting".  i'm not even sure of the photo i have...

  it was hot, very hot that morning and colleagues of mine were conducting a training exercise for some us army national guard, us marines, and republic of georgia military forces at a range nearby to vasiani airbase, republic of georgia.  i was in fact focused on the training at hand and was using my camera as a training aid to point out potential strengths and weaknesses of any particular units maneuver techniques.
  this all goes very well and i end up with roughly 200 photos or so over the course of a week and a half. (yes, this was just prior to the little spat between georgia and russia - we were complete with training only 3 days prior to the whole fanfare...)
  these photos fly home with me to germany where i am stationed and i think little of them, planning to discard the photos that didn't turn out so well and toss the rest in a folder on a hardrive for historical records.
  while reviewing the photos, i come across one in particular with what appears to be a blemish on the lens (it may yet turn out to be that, but read on...)  thinking that the lens must have had a dirt smudge or something on it, i scan through to the next few photos in that set and find nothing out of the ordinary.  so i go back to this blemished photo and begin to analyze what i am seeing.
  the picture was taken from a canon powershot sd1000, 7.1 mpix. at maximum resolution (i have a 2gb storage card, so who cares how big the photos are...I like the detail).  this allowed me to zoom in and at least try to see if any more detail could be revealed.  of course, i was disappointed to see nothing but a gray cigar shaped blob with a samll roundish bulb above and below its shape.
  zooming out from the photo, you will se that the foreground is clear and in focus but this object is still fuzzy.  i swear to myself that it must have been a bug or something crossing the fov, but wouldn't it be a little clearer in focus?
  or maybe it is in the background but moving so fast that it is out of focus?  i'm not sure.  i will rule out low and slow aircraft because the area you see in the picture is a "live fire range" (shooting range) and forthe army, firing live ammo is not allowed when the potential to harm is evident.  so this area has been given a green light be the powers that be for us to conduct training with live ammunition.  this means...You guessed it...Nothing downrange (that we know of).
  anyway, you have a look at it, disseminate it, spread it around.
a few questions come to mind when i look at this:  if it is far enough away to be blurry, just how big is it?  if it isn't far away, why then is it blurry?  it looks close, but there is no shadow cast.  i've lived in a desert for nearly 7 years and i understand how distances can be deceptive - but if this thing is maybe 5-10 miles (my somewhat educated guess) it has to be huge and moving very swiftly (and silently) for no one to take any particular notice.
  i try to be a skeptic about photos, but as i took this one myself, i have trouble believing what i am seeing.  let better minds than mine come up with an explanation.  i want to think "spacecraft", but the little voice is saying "bird"...


included are photos of area taken seconds apart (all three are part of the set)

thanks

glen currier
sfc
us army
content.summary: There was no "event"

content.detailedDescription: My brother rick reported sightings at night (large transparent and dark)and during the daytime (silver spheres)over waukegan.  you will have to contact him for specifics.
content.summary: Sighted during day hours
